name: SaaS Subscription
description: Recurring-access software or data platform with tiered pricing.

name: Licensing
description: Grant rights to use your IP to manufacturers/integrators for royalties.

name: Reseller / Distributor Channel
description: Use distributors to sell your product into established markets.

name: Pay-Per-Use Service
description: Customers pay per unit of usage (kWh, hours, API calls).

name: Consulting-to-Product Ladder
description: Start with paid services, then transition to a standardized product.
